text.*:
From March 1987 to March 1, 1994, Nirvana performed on various shows and concerts:

Contents

  • 1 List of live performances
    • 1.1 Early Gigs
    • 1.2 Bleach club tour
    • 1.3 Late-1990 to mid-1991 intermittent club shows
    • 1.4 Nevermind club, arena and festival tour
    • 1.5 Mid-1992 to early-1993 arena, festival and stadium shows
    • 1.6 Mid-1993 intermittent arena shows
    • 1.7 In Utero arena tour
  • 2 References
  • 3 External links
